title: Modular Monolith with Angular & Nx: Returning to the Basics
description: In a world obsessed with microservices, is there still a place for monolithic architectures? Absolutely! In Modular Monolith with Angular & Nx: Returning to the Basics, I will show how to build scalable and flexible applications using a modular monolith. With Angular and Nx, this approach simplifies development and improves performance, helping teams avoid the complexity of microservices while still getting the benefits of modularity.
speaker: joan-serna-leiton
